name: Appverse Web
tagline: ria + spring + jpa = cool web apps
body:
![Appverse](http://appversed.files.wordpress.com/2012/12/logo.png)

## Overview

A multi-frontend technology capable web application framework incorporating the best-of-breed open source stack to meet the challenges of secure and robust server-side service development, integration and delivery. It aims to make web developer’s life easier by providing architectural solutions based on well-known an proven open-source frameworks and third-party libraries both for server-sides and front-ends based on Java technologies.

![Appverse Web Overview](http://appversed.files.wordpress.com/2012/12/appverse-web-overview.png?w=1024&h=501)

Appverse Web is licensed under the Appverse Public License (APL) based on the Mozilla Public License V2.0. You can get a copy of the license [here](http://appverse.org/legal/appverse-license/). 

## Project Organization

### Web

* [Appverse Project](http://appverse.org) informational site.
* [Appverse Project](http://appverse.github.com/) organization github site.
* [Appverse Web](http://appverse.github.com/appverse-web/) project github site.
* [Project Wiki](https://github.com/Appverse/appverse-web/wiki) documentation.
* Project API documentation. (pending)

### Mailing Lists

#### Users & Developers

<appverse@googlegroups.com> - The Users & Developers mailing list is available to the public. To subscribe to the mailing list send a mail to <appverse+subscribe@googlegroups.com>. To unsubscribe send a mail to <appverse+unsubscribe@googlegroups.com>.

#### Question & Answers

<appverse-qa@googlegroups.com> - The Question & Answers mailing list is available to the public. To subscribe to the mailing list send a mail to <appverse-qa+subscribe@googlegroups.com>. To unsubscribe send a mail to <appverse-qa+unsubscribe@googlegroups.com>.

#### Commits

<appverse-commits@googlegroups.com> - The Commits mailing list is available to the public and provides automatic details of recent activity in the Appverse source repositories - this information is useful if you're submitting patches or watching for latest fixes and requested features. To subscribe to the mailing list send a mail to <appverse-commits+subscribe@googlegroups.com>. To unsubscribe send a mail to <appverse-commits+unsubscribe@googlegroups.com>.

#### Private

<appverse-private@googlegroups.com> - The Private mailing list is only for committers and direct contributors to the Appverse project. When you become a contributor you'll be invited to the group. If not, please send a mail to the project mentor who administers to the project as a whole.

### Forum

#### Users & Developers

<https://groups.google.com/d/forum/appverse> - The Users & Developers forum is available to the public. This forum provides a web interface to the aforementioned mailing list.

#### Question & Answers

<https://groups.google.com/d/forum/appverse-qa> - The Question & Answers forum is available to the public. This forum provides a web interface to the aforementioned mailing list.

### Issue Tracking & Feature Requests

For new features or to report an issue, please raise a ticket in our issue tracker on github. When reporting issues or requesting features we - the committers - want you to work with us, not against us; please provide as much information as possible to help us help the community. We welcome patches, new code, new features and other contributions!

* [Appverse Web Issue Tracker](https://github.com/Appverse/appverse-web/issues)

### License & Agreements

* [Appverse Public License v2.0](http://appverse.org/legal/appverse-license/apl_v2-0/)
* [Corporate Contributor License Agreement](http://appverse.org/legal/appverse-license/apl_2-0_ccla/)
* [Individual Contributor License Agreement](http://appverse.org/legal/appverse-license/apl_v2-0_icla/)

## Authors & Contributors

### Mentor & Administrator
* @carloslozano - Carlos Lozano <carlos@appverse.org>

### Committers
* Pending: Awaiting CCLA & ICLA from initial team.

## Contribute!

Appverse is licensed under the Appverse Public License (APL) based on the Mozilla Public License V2.0. You can get a copy of the license [here](http://appverse.org/legal/appverse-license/).

If you wish to contribute to the community, please refer to the Mailing Lists and Forum section of the project organization section of this site. Also, if you wish to contribute your time and/or source code, please refer to the [Appverse Public License](http://appverse.org/legal/appverse-license/) page and the [contribute](http://appverse.org/contribute/) page on our main site.

## Support & Contact

This project is open-source and supported by the team of committers and the community. If you require commercial support for your application, please contact <sales@appverse.org> to discuss your needs. We recommend you check out our mailing lists and forums for other information and development support.

## Licenses & Legal

Appverse is licensed under the Appverse Public License (APL) based on the Mozilla Public License V2.0. You can get a copy of the license [here](http://appverse.org/legal/appverse-license/).


Copyright © 2012 Appverse™. Appverse® is a registered trademark of GFT Appverse S.L. Apple, Apple logo and iOS are copyright and trademarks of Apple, Inc. In case of issues relating to copyrights and trademarks, please contact <legal@appverse.org> to request the appropriate attributions or rectifications.
